snippet.title: Wait! Life is Beautiful! – Animated Trailer [ENG]
snippet.description:
W!LiB! on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/680830

Wait! Life is Beautiful! is an interactive psychological thriller about suicides with a touch of black humor. This is a story about a void in the soul, about search and loss of the life purpose in trying to save oneself and others. This is a life that can be lived your own way. For any life is beautiful... isn’t it?

Design & animation by clotofvice (Taya Kraiukhina) - https://www.instagram.com/clotofvice/
Sound by xpelled (Andrey Tochenov) - https://linktr.ee/xpelled
Concept by Marie Shkileva - https://linktr.ee/marie.sh
